content: Se non hai fatto altre operazioni, sono nel Cestino di Thunderbird.
creator: @next

content:
If you using the up to date version then you might be trying to use the new Account Hub which is still under experimental phase and some people have been having a problem. Please switch it off and then retry to add the yahoo account.

  • Menu app icon > New Account > Email

How to switch off / disable the 'Account Hub':

  • Settings > General
  • Scroll to 'Account Hub'
  • uncheck /deselect this option 'Create accounts in the new Account hub'

Please report back if this works for you as the feedback information will get posted to the developers. Many thanks.
creator: Toad-Hall

content: If the folders are bold, they contain unread emails. change the font to non bold by marking all mail in the folder as read.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: If you are being prompted for password, the one that Thunderbird has isn't working anymore. If you need a new password, you need to contact your email provider. If that is not the situation, then you need to provide more information. Thank you
creator: davidsk

content: If you need to reset the password, you should contact your email provider. Thunderbird will then store it for you.
creator: davidsk
